content.p: Our large and diverse team bring a much-needed research rigour to a global community that has awoken to the historic possibility of ending slavery in our lifetime Leadership | Operations | Research and Impact Development | Measurement and Geographies Programme | Law and Policy Programme | Business and Economies Programme | Health and Communities Programme Rights Lab Director Rights Lab Research Director and Professor of Political Science Rights Lab Associate Director (Measurement and Geographies Programme) and Professor of Earth Observation Rights Lab Associate Director (Business and Economies Programme) and Professor of Supply Chain Management Rights Lab Associate Director (Law and Policy Programme) and Associate Professor of Antislavery Law and Policy Rights Lab Associate Director (Health and Communities Programme) and Associate Professor in Mental Health Learn about the Measurement and Geographies programme Learn about the Law and Policy programme Learn about the Business and Economies programme Learn about the Health and Communities Programme
